alert.note: Alert for Champaign; Vermilion (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 09 at 5:48AM CST by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Vermilion and Champaign Counties through 615 AM CST... At 548 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Philo, or 10 miles southeast of Champaign, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... St. Joseph and Homer around 555 AM CST. Ogden around 600 AM CST. Oakwood, Fithian and Muncie around 605 AM CST. Other locations in the path of this storm include Potomac. This includes the following highways... Interstate 57 between mile markers 219 and 257. Interstate 72 between mile markers 180 and 182. Interstate 74 between mile markers 174 and 219. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
